row.value1: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <QUERY version="11.2."> <file css="Standard.css" type="HTML">Output.html</file> <client>5000</client> <max_rows>1000</max_rows> <source>STATISTICS</source> <reference> <date>TODAY</date> <offset>-168</offset> </reference> <selection> <include name="OBJECT_TYPE" value="JOBS"/> <include name="STATUS" value="1800,1801,1802,1810,1815,1820,1821,1822,1823,1824,1825,1826,1827,1828,1829,1830,1850,1851,1852,1853,1854,1856,1860,1896,1899"/> </selection> <output order="ascending" sort="OBJECT_NAME"> <field name="OBJECT_TYPE"/> <field name="OBJECT_NAME"/> <field name="OBJECT_TITLE"/> <field name="RETCODE"/> <field name="STATUS"/> <field name="RUN_NUMBER"/> <field name="PARENT_SCHEDULE_NAME"/> <field name="PARENT_JOBPLAN_NAME"/> <field name="JOB_TYPE"/> <field name="ARCHIVE_KEY1"/> <field name="ARCHIVE_KEY2"/> <field name="LOGIN_INFO"/> <field name="START_TIME"/> <field name="END_TIME"/> <field name="ESTIMATED_RUNTIME"/> <field name="RUNTIME"/> <field name="HOST"/> <field name="LOGIN"/> <field name="VERSION"/> </output> </QUERY>
